import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useMutation } from '@apollo/client' import { CHANGE_BORN } from './../queries' const Authors = (props) => { const [name, setName] = useState('') const [born, setBornTo] = useState('') const [ changeBorn ] = useMutation(CHANGE_BORN) const submit = async () => { changeBorn({ variables: { name, born } }) console.log('add book...') setName('') setBornTo('') } if (!props.show) { return null } const authors = props.authors console.log(authors, 'authors in Authors.js') if (!props.token) { return (

authors

{authors.map(a => )}
born books
{a.name} {a.born} {a.bookCount}
) } return (

authors

{authors.map(a => )}
born books
{a.name} {a.born} {a.bookCount}

Set birthyear

name setName(target.value)} />
born setBornTo(Number(target.value))} />
) } export default Authors
